content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Ah, Nesibe. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure we can come to an agreement on the rental price for my apartment. May I ask, what is your budget for a one-bedroom apartment in New York?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Therefore, I am willing to negotiate with you. What do you propose?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Well, Nesibe, I'm sorry to say that I cannot accept such a low offer. As a landlord, I have to consider my own expenses and the market value of the apartment. My proposal is €800 per month, which is a fair price for a one-bedroom apartment in this area. Is this something you can agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €800 per month. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Excellent, Nesibe. I'm glad we could come to an agreement. You can move in on the first day of the month. I'll send you the lease agreement and further details via email. Thank you for choosing my apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
